channel.title: Combat interface + another thing
channel.description:
Is there a way to rip JUST the combat interface off a server? I know how to get all the interfaces, but I like the ones I currently have, besides the combat one.
One more question. I've been trying to add Icons to my hunter/construction spots. I can't for some reason, I've tried cache packing them, I've tried adding in sprites folder and still nothing. Am I forgetting the code or what?
